entities.name: traffic
entities.description: Traffic was described as 'rumbling along the main road ahead'.

entities.name: main road
entities.description: The main road was mentioned as the location where traffic was rumbling.

entities.name: car
entities.description: The car was mentioned as the vehicle that Harry and Ron were in.

relationships.description: Ron pressed a tiny silver button on the dashboard to activate the Invisibility Booster.
Harry was in the car when it vanished and reappeared.
